description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0262 ( Privacy Level)
name: v2 Privacy Level

text.div:
Privacy Level

CodeDescriptionNederlands (Dutch)CommentVersion
F IsolationIsolatieadded v2.3
